io.openems.edge.bridge.modbus.api.task

Class AbstractReadTask<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.openems.edge.bridge.modbus.api.task.AbstractTask
      • io.openems.edge.bridge.modbus.api.task.AbstractReadTask<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadTask, Task, ManagedTask
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractReadDigitalInputsTask, AbstractReadInputRegistersTask

    public abstract class AbstractReadTask<T>
extends AbstractTask
implements ReadTask
    An abstract Modbus 'AbstractTask' is holding references to one or more Modbus AbstractModbusElement which have register addresses in the same range.
